Package com.stuypulse.stuylib.network

Class SmartAngle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.stuypulse.stuylib.network.SmartAngle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.function.Supplier<Angle>
    public class SmartAngle
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.function.Supplier<Angle>
    SmartAngle works as a wrapper for numbers on the network. This class handles converting a double on the network to an Angle
